I Am Nicole The

I specialize in front-end web development

View My Work

I Specialize In

Creating and developing fast and interactive user interfaces and web applications that are simple and easy to use as well as enticing to look at.

Front-End Developer

I enjoy creating beautiful web applications using languages such as HTML5, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript, and PHP

UI/UX

Designing an elegant user experience so users can easily navigate their way through websites and find what they came for is my passion

Simplicity

Everything I build is created with simplicity in mind. My goal is to convey the message that you want to send.

My Creative Process

All of my web development projects are based off of a practical formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Needfinding & Research

It all begins with establishing requirements for the site. What are the goals for the site? Call to action? Who is the audience?

2

Brainstorming & Designing

Create design goals for the site based on needfinding and begin prototyping different design alternatives and testing them out.

3

Development

After evaluating which design best satisfies the site's goals, the site is built using simple, clean, reusable code.

4

Evaluating & Testing

Test out the site to be sure that the needfinding goals are being met by the site and that users can easily navigate through.
